column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Marisabel - Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We believe our pricing is competitive given our location in Midtown and the quality of product that we serve. As far as our ambiance is concerned
column2: we definitely market to a younger crowd
column3: but I can assure you countless families comprising infants
column6: and any and all stripe of person have walked through our door. We appreciate any and all ramen lovers equally.
